title: help me identify this font?
content:
anyone able to help me identify this font?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709020500im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/whatfont_6405.jpg)

 [‹ Emigre Matrix Typeface](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709020500/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44934 "Go to previous forum topic") [Typographic BERLIN ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709020500/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44942 "Go to next forum topic")
author: rubydellson

comments.content:
Looka like Souvenir to me.  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/itc-souvenir/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709020500/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/itc-souvenir/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/itc-souvenir/")
